snippet: The city released hundreds of e-mail messages Friday, providing a look at one of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s major battles, the 2010 campaign to expand charter schools.
abstract: New York City releases hundreds of e-mail messages, providing a behind-the-scenes look at Mayor Michael R Bloomberg's 2010 campaign to expand charter schools in the city; e-mails were released in response to a Freedom of Information request by the city's teacher's union.
lead_paragraph: The city released hundreds of e-mail messages Friday, providing a look at one of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s major battles, the 2010 campaign to expand charter schools.

headline.seo: Bloomberg’s Charter School Battle Detailed in E-Mails
headline.main: E-Mails Provide Inside Look at Mayor’s Charter School Battle
headline.print_headline: E-Mails Provide Inside Look at Mayor’s Charter School Battle
